lines.text: You're either the greatest romantic hero of all time... or you're the stupidest penguin who's ever lived!
I wonder how far it is to Antarctica
3000 miles in that direction. But you'll never get there. I'll give it three days tops and you'll be in the belly of anything from a killer whale, to a sardine!
You're crazy, you're insane; you're amazing.
Hey, Hubie, you forgot your blasted pebble!
My Pebble? My Pebble! Rocko, you found it!
Don't just stand there, Romeo. Give the girl the pebble.
Do you like it?
I love it.
She'd better.
Good.
But don't you know? It's not the pebble, it's the penguin. I love you even more.
Everybody knows that penguins can't fly!
You're wrong! You are dead wrong! Our ancestors flew! They gave us wings when we can't fly?! I mean, I mean whose idea of a cruel joke is this?
[after Hubie's failure to beat Drake]

[to Hubie]
Go knock his block off!
Well, Marina. When shall I announce our engagement? Today? Tomorrow? Wednesday?
Hey Rocko! What do you call a flower before it opens?
What?
What do you call a flower before it opens?
A bud.
I love it when you call me bud!
[Groans]
Wake up and smell the seaweed!
Goodness Glaciers!
